1.Title: Get Everyone Fired Up
1.Description: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> hits an enemy, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>6%</color> for 8s. While the target is under an Attribute Anomaly, this effect is increased by an additional <color=#2BAD00>6%</color>.

2.Title: Get Everyone Fired Up
2.Description: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> hits an enemy, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>6.9%</color> for 8s.
